reviews.review: Vou dizer, o jogo está repleto de bugs mas do mesmo jeito é divertido e legal, fica a seu critério.
Faz muito tempo que não consigo mais me divertir nesse jogo. Bug, Hitbox, o end game totalmente desbalanceado. Não pretendo voltar a jogar.
Wonderful game, great fun and would recommend to anyone who hasn't played.
good with friends, meh by yourself. random teammates can either be great or terrible

As of last update, it is a waste of time. After 5 years and too many hours.. today is the day I uninstalled this TRASH!

Awesome game, I play only as Killer. Just try it out after checking some videos, it's incredibly unique and imaginative. I've never seen such an asymmetrical game be so balanced. 

It is not so perfectly balanced to be an ESport or anything. Don't go in trying to be a hardcore pro gamer, just have fun. It'll still take a very long time to reach the skill cap.

Os desenvolvedores simplesmente se envolveram com NFT. É hora desse jogo acabar.

This game is good, i enjoy it, you can play with friends or you can play solo.Its session game where you can relieve your stress (as a killer) after hard day, or you can get scared as a survivor without the need to watch horror movies at night(though while playing a lot you get used to it, but still it happens  :D ). Its cheap at the moment so you can get it without worry, its worth it.
good game. been loyal since day one and never been disappointed. 12/10 would recommend.

Good Afternoon!
Thought I would write a quick review for this game, and honestly this game still blows my mind. Trust me, I only have 7.1 hours but all I want to do is play the game. There are a few downsides when you cannot find a match or the servers go down for maintenance, but regardless that rarely happens. It is one of those games where you can a good laugh with friends or play it more seriously. You get to creep around and run for your life, jump scares can happen but not too bad, or you get to cut players faces off and stick them on a hook to die, both great options.
Nevertheless, if you even are thinking about buying this game, do it, completely worth it. It can run on almost any machine if you modify the settings a little, personally myself I play on a Mac with a self-optimized PC emulator and it runs smoothly with some setting changes. 
------> Overall Score: 8.5/10 <------

Dead By Daylight is probably my number 1 go-to game. I have spent quite a while on this game, and have mastered Survivor and close to mastering Killer. This game,  just like every, has its bugs and hit box issues with some killers, but they are very manageable. Survivor is very fun to play and requires quite a bit of teamwork. And Killer is also very fun and will need some mind games at the high ranks in order to win a chase. I do love how this game is made, I think everything Behaviour has done has been a good change or addition. There are a few things I could say should be changed but other than those it is a great game.

9/10

/в связи с событиями 5 августа, когда дбд стало недоступно в библиотеке сТиМ/
玩法真的亮眼，，能有更多与地图的交互就好了，不只是翻板子和窗户，道具也可以更多样化。中低段位匹配时间还是有点长，好友系统不太稳定。开黑玩的乐趣（不是指车队）真的和其他游戏感觉完全不一样。对于没有尝试过这类游戏的人强烈推荐。
DBD это хоррор где маньяк боится выживших
